title: Understanding Trading Modes Quiz
description: Test your understanding of different trading modes in Quantum Object Trader

questions.question: What is the main difference between paper trading and live trading?

options.text: Paper trading uses simulated money for practice

feedback.correct: Correct! Paper trading allows you to practice without risking real money.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Paper trading is a simulation mode that uses virtual money for practice trading.

questions.question: When should you switch from paper trading to live trading?

options.text: After making one successful paper trade
After consistently profitable paper trading and thorough system testing

feedback.correct: Correct! You should only switch to live trading after thorough testing and consistent paper trading success.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. It's important to thoroughly test the system and demonstrate consistent success in paper trading first.

questions.question: What is the recommended initial position size when switching to live trading?

feedback.correct: Correct! Starting with smaller positions and gradually increasing them is the safest approach.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. It's best to start with smaller positions and increase them gradually as you gain confidence.
